frontmatter.title: Be aware of canaries (and dinosaurs)
frontmatter.description: When developing an app, be aware of any browser version. Oh, and also, look for a dinosaur that has come to life in the middle of 2020.

frontmatter.title: Eastern Promises
frontmatter.description: Nope, it is not about the movie. Just pointing the clear difference between JS promises and async/await.
